article_text: A new state report concludes that without continued supplemental funding from the federal government, Florida’s largest public hospitals would be severely limited in their ability to continue treating large numbers of Medicaid and uninsured patients.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Low Income Pool, safety net hospitals, Jackson Health System, Medicaid
article_metadata.title: Report: Florida hospitals at risk of losing $1.3 billion | Miami Herald
